item.description: In this episode of Cooking in America, host Sheldon Simeon gets his hands a little dirty and helps prep
item.content:encoded: In this episode of Cooking in America, host Sheldon Simeon gets his hands a little dirty and helps prep a Vietnamese crawfish boil at Cajun Kitchen in Houston, Texas.

item.title: POWER RANGERS (2017) // Ludi Lin on His High School Crush
item.dc:creator: Ramen
item.description: BAND WITH NO NAME Films was in the house for a press conference featuring Lionsgate’s upcoming Power Rangers movie!
item.content:encoded: BAND WITH NO NAME Films was in the house for a press conference featuring Lionsgate’s upcoming Power Rangers movie! Ludi Lin, who plays Zack aka The Black Ranger, talks about the original Japanese series as well as his first high school crush.

item.title: Columbus
item.dc:creator: Ramen
item.description: Co-stars John Cho, Michelle Forbes, Haley Lu Richardson, Parker Posey, and Rory Culkin join director Kogonada sit down to
item.content:encoded:
Co-stars John Cho, Michelle Forbes, Haley Lu Richardson, Parker Posey, and Rory Culkin join director Kogonada sit down to discuss their new film ‘Columbus’, aptly named after its setting in Ohio.

The Korean-born son (John Cho) of an ailing architecture critic and the daughter (Haley Lu Richardson) of a recovering addict (Michelle Forbes) bond over their fears of losing a parent while both are temporarily stranded in Columbus, Indiana. Her passion for architecture creates an avenue for frank talk with each other about their situation.

https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/columbus_2017

item.title: Revenge of the Green Dragons
item.dc:creator: Ramen
item.description: In the vein of crime classics like MEAN STREETS and INFERNAL AFFAIRS, REVENGE OF THE GREEN DRAGONS follows two
item.content:encoded: In the vein of crime classics like MEAN STREETS and INFERNAL AFFAIRS, REVENGE OF THE GREEN DRAGONS follows two immigrant brothers Sonny (Justin Chon) and Steven (Kevin Wu) who survive the impoverished despair of New York in the 1980s by joining Chinatown gang “The Green Dragons”. The brothers quickly rise up the ranks, drawing the unwanted attention of hard-boiled city cops. After an ill- fated love affair pits Sonny against his own brother, he sets out for revenge on the very gang who made him who he is. From acclaimed Director Andrew Lau and Andrew Loo, and legendary Executive Producer Martin Scorsese comes a brilliant mix between a Hong Kong action film and a New York City crime thriller, portraying the never-before-told true story of “The Green Dragons”.

item.title: Valor With Honor
item.dc:creator: Ramen
item.description: “Valor With Honor” is an independent documentary film based on over 35 oral histories of Japanese American WW2 veterans.
item.content:encoded: “Valor With Honor” is an independent documentary film based on over 35 oral histories of Japanese American WW2 veterans. These heroic veterans served in the Japanese American 442nd Regimental Combat Team. The 442nd is the most decorated unit for its size and length of service in the history of the United States Armed Forces. The Japanese American 100th Battalion, 442nd Regimental Combat Team, and the Military Intelligence Service were awarded the Congressional Gold Medal (2012) for outstanding service to the country in WW2.
